CreateReconstructDocumentFlow.document:
This API is used to initiate requests for this asynchronous API, for initiating document parsing tasks.
Document parsing supports converting images or PDF files into Markdown format files, and can parse content elements including tables, formulas, images, headings, paragraphs, headers, and footers, and intelligently convert the content into reading order. Please refer to the input parameter list below for specific supported file types.
During the trial period, the QPS limit for a single account is only 1. If you need to access officially, please contact our R&D team.
CreateReconstructDocumentFlow.name: Document Parsing Task Creation

CreateSplitDocumentFlow.document: This API is used to create document segmentation tasks, support various file types, possess mllm capacity, and can analyze and deeply understand the information in charts.
CreateSplitDocumentFlow.name: Document Splitting Task Creation

GetReconstructDocumentResult.document: This is an asynchronous API for querying results, which is used to obtain the result of document parsing.
GetReconstructDocumentResult.name: Query Document Parsing Task Result

GetSplitDocumentResult.document: This API is used to query the results of document splitting tasks.
GetSplitDocumentResult.name: Query Document Splitting Task Result

QueryRewrite.document:
QueryRewrite is mainly used in multi-round conversations for reference resolution and ellipsis completion. Using this API, you don't need to input prompt descriptions. A more accurate user query can be generated based on the conversation history. In terms of application scenarios, this API can be applied to various scenarios such as intelligent Q&A and conversational search.
There is a call limit for single-account for this API. If you need to increase the concurrency limit, please contact us (https://cloud.tencent.com/act/event/Online_service).
QueryRewrite.name: Multiple rounds of rewriting

ReconstructDocumentSSE.document: This API is used for quasi-real-time document parsing, using HTTP SSE protocol for communication.
ReconstructDocumentSSE.name: Performs real-time document parsing

RunRerank.document: This API is used to reorder the results of multi-channel recall based on the rerank model of knowledge engine fine-tuning model technology, sort the segments according to the relevance between the query and the segment content from high to low score, and output the corresponding scoring results.
RunRerank.name: Reorder

CreateReconstructDocumentFlowConfig.document: Configuration information for creating intelligent document parsing tasks.

members.document:
The form in which tables in a Markdown file are returned.
- 0: returned as MD.
- 1: returned as HTML.
The default is 0.
members.name: TableResultType

members.document:
The format of the returned results of intelligent document parsing.
- 0: only returns full-text MD.
- 1: only returns the OCR original Json for each page.
- 2: only returns the MD of each page.
- 3: returns the full-text MD and the original OCR Json of each page.
- 4: returns full-text MD and MD of each page.
The default value is 3 (returns the full-text MD and the original OCR Json of each page).
members.name: ResultType

members.document:
File type.
**Supported file types**: PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX, MD, TXT, PNG, JPG, JPEG, CSV, HTML, EPUB, BMP, GIF, WEBP, HEIC, EPS, ICNS, IM, PCX, PPM, TIFF, XBM, HEIF, JP2.
**Supported file sizes**: 
- Max 100 MB for PDF.
- Max 200 MB for DOC, DOCX, PPT, and PPTX .
- Max 10 MB for MD, and TXT.
- Max 20 MB for others.
members.name: FileType

members.document: File URL. It is recommended to store the file in Tencent Cloud as the URL where the file is stored in Tencent Cloud can ensure higher download speed and stability. External URL may affect the speed and stability. Refer to: [Tencent Cloud COS Documentation](https://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/436/7749)
members.name: FileUrl

members.document: The base64 value of the file. Supported file types: PNG, JPG, JPEG, PDF, BMP, TIFF. File size limit: the downloaded file does not exceed 8MB after base64 encoding. File download time does not exceed 3 seconds. Supported image pixels: the length of a single side is between 20-10000px. Either FileUrl or FileBase64 of the file must be provided. If both are provided, only the FileUrl is used.
members.name: FileBase64

members.document: The starting page number of the file. When type of the uploaded file is pdf, doc, ppt, or pptx, it specifies the starting page number for recognition, including the current value.
members.name: FileStartPageNumber

members.document: The end page number of the file. When type of the uploaded file is pdf, doc, ppt, or pptx, it specifies the end page number for recognition, including the current value.
members.name: FileEndPageNumber

members.document: Creates task configuration information for document parsing.
members.name: Config

members.document: Unique task ID. The processing result corresponding to TaskId can be queried through the API [GetReconstructDocumentResult] within 30 days.
members.name: TaskId

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document:
The form in which tables in a Markdown file are returned.
- 0: returned as MD.

members.document:
The format of the returned results of intelligent document parsing.
- 0: only returns full-text MD.
- 1: only returns the OCR original Json for each page.
- 2: only returns the MD of each page.
- 3: returns the full-text MD and the original OCR Json of each page.

The default value is 3 (returns the full-text MD and the original OCR Json of each page).
members.name: ResultType

members.document: Whether to enable mllm.

members.document: Max segment length.
members.name: MaxChunkSize

members.document:
File type.
**Supported file types**: PDF, DOC, DOCX, XLS, XLSX, PPT, PPTX, MD, TXT, PNG, JPG, JPEG, CSV, HTML, EPUB.
**Supported file sizes**: 
- Max 500 MB for PDF.
- Max 200 MB for DOC, DOCX, PPT, and PPTX .
- Max 10 MB for MD, and TXT.
- Max 20 MB for others.
members.name: FileType

members.document:
File URL. It is recommended to store the file in Tencent Cloud as the URL where the file is stored in Tencent Cloud can ensure higher download speed and stability. External URL may affect the speed and stability. 
Refer to: [Tencent Cloud COS Documentation](https://cloud.tencent.com/document/product/436/7749).
members.name: FileUrl

members.document:
Filename. optional.
**The file type suffix shall be included**. This field is required to be specified when the file name cannot be obtained from the passed-in "FileUrl".
members.name: FileName

members.document: The base64 value of the file. File size limit: the downloaded file shall not exceed 8MB after base64 encoding. File download time does not exceed 3 seconds. Supported image pixels: the length of a single side is between 20-10000px. Either FileUrl or FileBase64 of the file must be provided. If both are provided, only the FileUrl is used.

members.document: The starting page number of the file. When type of the uploaded file is pdf, doc, ppt, or pptx, it specifies the starting page number for recognition, including the current value.

members.document:
The unique ID of the splitting task.
The splitting results corresponding to the TaskId can be queried through the [GetSplitDocumentResult] API within 30 days.

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.

DocumentUsage.document: The usage of document splitting task.

members.document: Page number of the document splitting task.
members.name: PageNumber

members.document: Total number of tokens consumed by the document splitting task.
members.name: TotalToken

members.document: Total number of tokens consumed by the document splitting task.
members.name: TotalTokens

members.document: Parsing task ID.
members.name: TaskId

members.document:
Task status.
-Success: execution completed.
-Processing: executing.
-Pause: paused.
-Failed: execution failed.
-WaitExecute: pending execution.
members.name: Status

members.document: Temporary download URL for the parsing result. The file is a zip compressed package, and the URL is valid for 30 minutes.
members.name: DocumentRecognizeResultUrl

members.document: Page number where document parsing fails.
members.name: FailedPages

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Splitting task ID.
members.name: TaskId

members.document:
Task status:
-Success: execution completed.
-Processing: executing.
-Pause: paused.
-Failed: execution failed.
-WaitExecute: pending execution.
members.name: Status

members.document:
Temporary download URL for the splitting result. The file is a zip compressed package, and the URL is valid for 30 minutes. The compressed package contains the following folders: \*.md, \*.jsonl, \*mllm.json, images.
>**jsonl** structure description:.
- page_content: Used to generate an embedding library for retrieval purposes. The images in this field will be replaced with placeholders.
- org_data: The minimum semantic integrity block corresponding to page_content, used for Q&A model processing.
- big_data: The maximum semantic integrity block corresponding to page_content, also used for Q&A model processing.
members.name: DocumentRecognizeResultUrl

members.document: Page number where document splitting fails.
members.name: FailedPages

members.document: Amount of the document split task.
members.name: Usage

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Role.
members.name: Role

members.document: Content.
members.name: Content

members.document: Chain of thought content. The ReasoningConent parameter only supports output parameters, and is only returned by the deepseek-r1 model.
members.name: ReasoningContent

members.document: The multi-round historical conversation that needs to be rewritten. Each round of historical conversation should include paired inputs of user (question) and assistant (answer). Due to the character limit of the model, a maximum of 4 rounds of conversations can be provided. The last round of conversation will be rewritten.
members.name: Messages

members.document: Model name.
members.name: Model

members.document: Rewritten result.
members.name: Content

members.document: Consumption. The numbers of input tokens, output tokens, and total tokens will be returned.
members.name: Usage

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Page number that failed to parse.
members.name: PageNumber

members.document:
The form in which tables in a Markdown file are returned.
- 0: returned as MD.
- 1: returned as HTML.
The default is 0.
members.name: TableResultType

members.document:
The form in which images in a Markdown file are returned.
- 0: returned as URL.
- 1: only return the text content extracted from the image in markdown.
The default value is 0.
members.name: MarkdownImageResponseType

members.document: Whether the Markdown file contains page number information.
members.name: ReturnPageFormat

members.document: The custom output page number style. {{p}} is a placeholder for the page number. Enable ReturnPageFormat to take effect. If empty, the default style is: <page_num>page {{p}}</page_num>.
members.name: PageFormat

members.document: The base64 value of the file. File size limit: the downloaded file shall not exceed 8MB after base64 encoding. File download time does not exceed 3 seconds. Supported image pixels: the length of a single side is between 20-10000px. Either FileUrl or FileBase64 of the file must be provided. If both are provided, only the FileUrl is used.
members.name: FileBase64

members.document: Document parsing configuration information.
members.name: Config

members.document: Task ID. The unique identifier of the current request.
members.name: TaskId

members.document: Response type. 1: return progress information; 2: return parsing result.
members.name: ResponseType

members.document: Progress. Value range: 0 to 100.
members.name: Progress

members.document: Progress information.
members.name: ProgressMessage

members.document: Temporary download URL for the document parsing result. The file is a zip compressed package, and the URL is valid for 30 minutes. The compressed package contains the following folders: \*.md, \*.jsonl, \*mllm.json, images.
members.name: DocumentRecognizeResultUrl

members.document: Page number where document parsing fails.
members.name: FailedPages

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem. As a streaming response API, when the request is successfully completed, the RequestId will be placed in the Header "X-TC-RequestId" of the HTTP response.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Query content.
members.name: Query

members.document: Document list, up to 20 documents.
members.example: ["腾讯知识引擎","知识引擎大模型"]
members.name: Docs

members.document: Model name. Default: lke-reranker-base.
members.name: Model

members.document: Relevance. A higher numeric value indicates greater relevance.
members.name: ScoreList

members.document: Consumption. Only returns TotalToken.
members.name: Usage

members.document: The unique request ID, generated by the server, will be returned for every request (if the request fails to reach the server for other reasons, the request will not obtain a RequestId). RequestId is required for locating a problem.
members.name: RequestId

members.document: Number of document pages.
members.name: TotalPages
